group_1.textCenter: This concludes our Student Council Social.@Thank you for all your hard work with the filming!

group_1.narration: And thank YOU for giving us such a@wide variety of footage!@We'll do our best to make this@a great documentary,@so please keep up the good work.

group_1.textCenter: Absolutely!@This is for Walnut's sake too, after all.
I will continue to serve as an excellent supervisor.

group_1.textRight: Excuse me, may I have a word with you?

group_1.textLeft: You're on the student council, correct?

group_1.textRight: I was very impressed with@the food you served today.

group_1.textLeft: Well, I'm glad to hear you say—

group_1.textRight: In light of your skills, Manaka Kurumi...
No, in light of Walnut's skills as a whole,@I'd like to ask you a favor.

group_1.textLeft: I plan on becoming the greatest chef in the world.@By all means, lay it on me!

group_1.textRight: Then please make this for me:
[flashEffect:explosion][bgEffect:shakeLarge]A chocolate that will guarantee@a successful confession!!
I'm glad you're willing to take on the task!

group_1.textLeft: Erm, we're a Western-style RESTAURANT,@not a Western-style confectionery shop...!

group_1.textRight: I'll give you an advance payment.

group_1.textCenter: *Gasp!* I lost myself for a moment@at the sight of all that money...
D-don't tell me...@I took the job?
But I can't back down now, can I?
I, Manaka, am going to be the greatest@chef in the world, so I can't give up!
I'll do everything I can to make this happen!!

group_1.narration: I think this will be a great opportunity,@so would you mind if I continue filming up-close?

group_1.textCenter: Yes! Please take all the footage you like!
And please promote this as much as possible!

group_1.narration: <Manaka Kurumi, at fourteen years of age@and the only daughter in her family,@works alongside her father to support Walnut's,@a long-established Western-style restaurant.>

group_1.textLeft: A chocolate that will guarantee@a successful confession?
